resources.string: Change the Google Discover feed to Google Snapshot, or launch any app you want
No app is selected to launch in DiscoverKiller
Reload Snapshot when returning home to keep it up-to-date. May cause higher data usage and white flashes when in dark mode
Apply Material You (Monet) colors to the background of Snapshot
Choose the app to launch when the overlay is fully opened
Always start the app as a new launch, without resuming it if it already open
Set which background to use for the overlay when swiping
Choose the color to use for Material You from your wallpaper
Due to system limitations, Custom Apps are launched when the overlay is fully opened, rather than being embedded.
Reload timed out. Try restarting the app.
Automatically attempts to select the best splash screen
Use the app\'s splash screen, from the native Android splash API
Use the app\'s splash screen, from the Android support splash API
Use the dominant color from the app icon for the background, with the icon on top
Use the app\'s window background, this is often the \'splash screen\' shown while the app is loaded
Use the Material You background color, generated from your wallpaper, with the icon on top. On supported apps, the icon will be tinted to the primary Material You color
Wallpaper Color Picker unavailable for the currently selected wallpaper

Discover Killer requires Xposed to work. You must install Xposed to continue.\n\nNote: If you do have Xposed installed but are using Xposed Hide, you must enable the Discover Killer module for both this app and the Google app to continue.
You must enable the Discover Killer Xposed module for this app and the Google app in your Xposed manager to continue
Version v%1s\nCreated by Kieron Quinn / Quinny899 @ XDA
This will save some of the logs related to the overlay, if they exist. You must choose a location to save to. If asked, please attach the log file to your XDA reply or GitHub issue.
